snippet: The decision also said that the company did not engage in bad-faith bargaining with the labor organization that represents its Brooklyn technicians.
abstract: National Labor Relations Board Judge Steven Fish rules that Cablevision chief executive officer James L Dolan gave raises illegally to company technicians in Bronx to improperly sway them to vote against unionizing.
lead_paragraph: The decision also said that the company did not engage in bad-faith bargaining with the labor organization that represents its Brooklyn technicians.

headline.main: Judge Calls Cablevision’s Raises an Anti-Union Act
headline.print_headline: Judge Calls Cablevision’s Raises an Anti-Union Act
